Firefly.server.spawnFireflyServer¶

Firefly.server.spawnFireflyServer(*args)[source]¶

Wrapper to Firefly.server.startFireflyServer() that instead starts a background process.

Returns

subprocess.Popen

Return type

subprocess handler
